text: A short passage about some important Chinese customs and traditions.中国是一个拥有悠久历史的国家，所以在中国文化中有很多习俗。比如，中国人相比较白色，更喜欢红色，因为红色是喜庆的颜色，例如中国人结婚时候穿红色礼服，但是有人去世的时候穿白色衣服。中国人会在重要的节日举行家庭聚餐，比如春节和中秋节。这两个节日的时候，不管家人在哪里工作，都会尽力回到自己的家乡和家人团聚。China is a country with a long history, so there are many customs in Chinese culture. For example, Chinese people like white and prefer red even more, because red is a festive color. For example, Chinese people wear red dresses when they are married, but when they die, they wear white clothes.Chinese people will hold family dinners at important festivals, such as the Spring Festival and Mid-Autumn Festival. During these two festivals, no matter where the family members work, they will try their best to return to their hometown and family reunion.1 – 以下哪个不是中国的习俗？a. 喜庆节日穿红色Review frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
